title: Stuck In Ranked Game
body:
I had just won a ranked game and had skipped the stats as they wouldn't load, i went to play another game but was given the reconnect screen? According to league we we're still in the game. When i 'try to reconnect' it simply says that i have lost connection to the server. They match also hasn't shown up in my history anywhere.

 I have reset my net and closed and reopened the game as well as restarting my pc and nothing has changed. Can anyone shed any light on this? {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Maybe riot does not love you.

This has happened to me, I was stuck after a ranked game ( and I chose to skip stats), so I just left it overnight, and have woken up now and can start matches. However for me, my loss in Promos appears in match history, but in the Ranked League Table I am still at 1-0, as if that game didn't count. oce.op.gg has it recorded, while Lolking and LolSkill think the match doesn't exist.

So i can now enter games with no problem, however, the ranked match i played as darius apparently never even happened, still has not come up in my history nor have i been awarded the LP points for winning the match. Anyone else experienced this?
